view.label: Lista de Presupuestos de una order de reparaci贸n
view.sqlSentence: SELECT CONCAT(delivery.series,"/",delivery.number), delivery.issue_time, registry.document, CONCAT_WS(", ",registry.surname,registry.name) FROM tas_delivery, delivery, registry WHERE tas_delivery.delivery = delivery.id AND tas_delivery.support_order = ? AND delivery.customer = registry.id

parameter.label: C贸digo de orden de reparaci贸n
parameter.name: support_order
